document.heading: RETIRED DISTRICT EMPLOYEE ANNUITY AMENDMENT ACT OF 2013

history.narrative: Law 20-198, the “Retirement Technical Amendments Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-440. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Oct. 7, 2014 and Oct. 28, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Nov. 26, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-491 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-198 became effective on Mar. 10, 2015.
